channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description: Let's face it, its a crap hole so i've decided to see if i can clear some of it up by helping moparscapers realise the error in their ways i will be constantly posting topics on there to help them change and keep a close contact with those that are outragousley gay i probably spelt outragous.. wrong but you get the gist of it I will try and clean up the godforsaken spit of the internet and see how it goes anyone who wants to help is welcome maybe we will be able to iradicate Moparscapers from there so its just proper people who can hold an intelligent conversation this is my first help topic for them [URL=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,272014.0.html]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,272014.0.html[/URL]

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:17, topic:206249”]I’m just saying that its funny how i never saw much off you when you had mod now that you come back i see plenty of these little speeches on how you think the community should be ran, here and in the hidden sections.

It was never meant to be an ‘attack’.[/quote]
[me=Tree]nods.[/me]

It’s fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’m just saying that its funny how i never saw much off you when you had mod now that you come back i see plenty of these little speeches on how you think the community should be ran, here and in the hidden sections.

It was never meant to be an ‘attack’.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:15, topic:206249”][quote author=Tree link=topic=272016.msg2230463#msg2230463 date=1211101214]
Give up. The staff members are unable to understand what needs to be done in order to fix the community. Slow steps should be used to prevent community opposition.
[/quote]
iirc when you had moparscape mod you did nothing, you didn’t fix moparscape either. So i wouldn’t be talking if i was you :)[/quote]

By staff members, i mean the administrators. Actually, when i had my position i did an excellent job. I made plenty of suggestions about the improvement of the community.

If it was anyone else, i would make a massive post which would contains large amounts of flaming. Just keep note that i do see this as a personal attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:3, topic:206249”]They can’t be bothered to do anything on their own.
I bet they’re still literally being spoon-fed.[/quote]

I doubt anyone was actually feeding them from a spoon, that would be strange.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @JavaBean JavaBean
item.description:
@JavaBean wrote:

[quote author=Frell link=topic=272016.msg2230310#msg2230310 date=1211094039]
Theres no stopping them.

They post in the wrong section, mod notifies them and moves it, the result

wy did u do that i just wnt sliab tiems....... . :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

Lul, silab did good but … moparscapers are taken over every runescape development forum with “silab how i get it i want silab items”

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:10, topic:206249”]They could live without a tutorial section.
Getting rid of it would push them to learn themselves, due to the tightened rules in the help section that don’t allow for spoon-feeding.

How many helpful “tutorials” have any of you seen there, anyways?
More of them end up locked than not.[/quote]
The development and help section would be flooded with stupid copy and paste tutorials

Read full topic

More of them end up locked than not.[/quote]

I don’t think that would happen man :. They would most likely spam up the site again.

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Well, think of it this way. Without them, there’s no mitb. Not enough traffic on this side of the site to pay for it…

You guys keep making fun of them, but you have to realize you’re making fun of kids. They’re probably 4-6 years younger then most of us.

But, there’s probably a few ways to fix the problem without deleting the site.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:5, topic:206249”]Mhm.
Copy and paste has been happening for as long as I can remember.
The mods might be doing a better job locking them, but it’s not stopping the endless flow of topics from spamming the section.

They’ve honestly got to start warning and moderating repeat offenders, otherwise this will never stop.[/quote]
There should be different developing sections, one for beginners, mild programmers, and serious ones. But getting them not visible to noobs may be a problem.

Read full topic
